price: Asnjëherë, Ne nuk kemi shkatërruar ndonjë vendbanim, pa i çuar më parë paralajmërues,
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā lahā mundhirūna
